Project Description
A Window Presentation Foundation (WPF) Color Picker control that can be themed and localized.

Test this controls inside my applications:
  • Locult

This project implements a WPF Color Picker control. This project is based on the color picker control contained in the Extended WPF Toolkitâ„¢ Community Edition:https://wpftoolkit.codeplex.com/ from Xceed.

This version of the control implements:
  • a few bug fixes (eg.: you cannot enter letters or more than 3 digits in a channel input element).
  • support localization for::
    • Chinese (Simplified) and Chinese (Traditional)
    • Dutch
    • English
    • French
    • German
    • Hindi
    • Indonesian
    • Italian
    • Japanese
    • Spanish
  • supports light and dark themes with Modern UI https://github.com/firstfloorsoftware/mui

These 4 styles have to be included to avoid a transparent background in the pop-up control:

    <!-- Popup Background -->
    <SolidColorBrush x:Key="PopupBackgroundBrush"  Color="#FF252526" />

    <!-- Popup Border -->
    <SolidColorBrush x:Key="PopupDarkBorderBrush" Color="#FFABADB3" />

    <!-- =============================================================================== -->
    <!-- ColorCanvas, ColorPicker                                                        -->
    <!-- =============================================================================== -->

    <DrawingBrush  x:Key="CheckerBrush" Viewport="0,0,10,10" ViewportUnits="Absolute" TileMode="Tile">
        <DrawingBrush.Drawing>
            <DrawingGroup>
                <GeometryDrawing Brush="White">
                    <GeometryDrawing.Geometry>
                        <RectangleGeometry Rect="0,0 100,100" />
                    </GeometryDrawing.Geometry>
                </GeometryDrawing>
                <GeometryDrawing Brush="LightGray">
                    <GeometryDrawing.Geometry>
                        <GeometryGroup>
                            <RectangleGeometry Rect="0,0 50,50" />
                            <RectangleGeometry Rect="50,50 50,50" />
                        </GeometryGroup>
                    </GeometryDrawing.Geometry>
                </GeometryDrawing>
            </DrawingGroup>
        </DrawingBrush.Drawing>
    </DrawingBrush>

    <SolidColorBrush x:Key="ColorPickerDarkBorderBrush" Color="Black" />
